Entities.Name: Symptoms
Entities.Definition: Clinical signs and subjective complaints identified from patient notes indicating any medical condition.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient reports severe back pain and frequent contractions.
Sample Data.Annotated: Symptoms: severe back pain, frequent contractions

Entities.Name: Events
Entities.Definition: Medical or health-related occurrences involving the patient, noted by clinical staff.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient was admitted with signs of labor onset.

Entities.Name: Anatomical Sites
Entities.Definition: Specific body parts or internal regions mentioned in the context of medical assessment or treatment.

Sample Data.Sentence: Ultrasound showed fluid accumulation in the abdominal cavity.

Entities.Name: Procedures
Entities.Definition: Medical interventions or procedures performed or scheduled, as recorded in the clinical notes.

Sample Data.Sentence: Scheduled for cesarean section due to complications.

Dataset.Name: Medical notes from high-risk pregnancies
Dataset.Details: Collection of notes from hospital staff during the hospitalization of patients at risk of preterm delivery, annotated for clinical entities.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: Detailed guidelines used for annotating the symptoms, events, anatomical sites, and procedures from the unstructured medical notes. Includes criteria for identification and annotation standards to ensure consistency across the dataset.
